promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi young rare serpent fighting-type pokemon wearing dark bracers. It can be found in canyon-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or serpent. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Bracefang, a a chibi young rare serpent fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in canyon-like environments It has the following abilities: Rock Black, Damage Curse. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "serpent", "fighting" or "Bracefang". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, serpent-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, red and purple ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Hidden within rugged canyons, Bracefang, the mini combat drake, uses Rock Black to blend in and Damage Curse to strike. A playful pugilist.
